hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a volatility contraction phase (Bollinger Band width < 0.5% of price) in NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent 4-hour candle close outside the bands with volume > 1.5x 20-period average will lead to a directional move of at least 2.5% in the breakout direction within 24 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression during neutral periods often precedes significant directional moves. The combination of technical squeeze with volume confirmation filters false breakouts. Current market shows consolidation after failed $90K attempt, creating setup potential.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band (20,2) width < 0.5% of current price
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 2.5% move in breakout direction from entry
exit_conditions.time_exit: 24 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >1.5% move within 12 hours OR price returns inside bands within 4 hours more than 60% of tested instances.
